Key Arguments: The legislation will infringe on freedom of speech.
Centralized control over information is not the solution to misinformation or disinformation.
The bill will create legal uncertainty for online platforms, leading to excessive censorship.
Historically, many ideas initially considered controversial or false have later been proven true.
Notable Quotes: I am Highly Disagreed Of This Bill because it will take away my Freedom Of Speech.

This draft bill, however, will effectively shut down the sharing of many ideas and create so much legal uncertainty for online platforms that they will be forced to censor anything which might be considered controversial.
Who is to say that similar things do not occur today?
